description.text: The pursuit of prey invigorates you. You revel in tracking down and slaying your quarry.

sections.Benefit: Once per day, when you succeed at a Survival check to find or follow a creature's tracks, you can designate that creature to be your prize for a number of hours equal to 4 + your ranks in Survival. You gain a +2 morale bonus on Survival checks to follow your prize's tracks and on weapon damage rolls against your prize.
sections.Special: An animal companion can choose this feat as if it were an animal feat.
